name: Bubble Candy Heroes: Bubble Mania
description:
Bubble Candy Heroes : Bubble Mania is the new exciting sequel to the highly popular Bubble Shooter game.
Do you like to play classic Bubble Candy Heroes Bubble Mania - Bubble Shooter games? Then you will definitely love this.
Fun and addictive bubble shooter game!
Easy and fun game play where you want to Shoot candy Bubbles, make clever combinations and find the hidden key to finish the level!

Bubble Candy Heroes : Bubble Mania is FREE, Fun and Addictive shooting candy bubble buster game. game! This classic bubble shooter game will keep you when waiting bus in city,or wating for something.
Pop all the bubbles to get to a new level, making connections of 3.
Shoot candy bubble also has colorblind mode for those who can't distinguish colors.
- shoot candy bubble base on time ,the bubbles will go down, and nonstop, so you quickly and so fast to get many score base time, if you don't die.

How to play:
- Tap where you want the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Tips: Breaking the bubbles continuously can get points as bonus.
Features:
- Simple but funny gameplay
- Fantastic graphics
- Delicate candy
- Having Many challenging levels.

Thank for play Bubble Candy Heroes : Bubble Mania
